actions.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 228 (Roll no. 108).

description: Amendment sought to strike the "deemed approved" language in the bill for any project for which an agency does not meet the deadlines outlined in the bill.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 113-374 to strike deemed approved language for any project for which an agency does not meet the deadlines contained in the bill.
